casebody.data:
Daniel WILLIAMS et al., Appellants,
v.
BEEMILLER, INC. &c, et al., Defendants, Charles Brown, Respondent. 2018-740 Court of Appeals of New York. August 30, 2018

Motion by Everytown for Gun Safety for leave to file a brief amicus curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. Two copies of the brief must be served, an original and nine **78copies filed, and the brief submitted in digital format within seven days.
